description: A list of information about each photo in the gallery. Programs that can output this format can provide data to Mirror

thumbnail_url.description: URL of the thumbnail image. Immutable, used as a unique identifier.

album.description: Name of the album. Immutable, provided as metadata to input systems.

genre.description: What category does this photo belong to?

places.description: List of places this photo was taken. This includes the country, city, type of location, and specific instance of location.

rating.description: Rating of the photo, represented by stars.

subjects.description: What things are in this photo?

description.description: Additional information to include about the photo, displayed in the UI.
